channel.title: Webclient error=client.class
channel.description:
Edit: I can [u]T.V.[/u]
Hello, I have a little problem with my webclient I managed to do everything except load my client on my forums. Client link -->Site Down :( Issue with Host :eek: Heres is the error message I get when I "Click for Details"
[code]Java Plug-in 1.6.0_26 Using JRE version 1.6.0_26-b03 Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM User home directory = C:\Users\"mycompuser" ---------------------------------------------------- c: clear console window f: finalize objects on finalization queue g: garbage collect h: display this help message l: dump classloader list m: print memory usage o: trigger logging q: hide console r: reload policy configuration s: dump system and deployment properties t: dump thread list v: dump thread stack x: clear classloader cache 0-5: set trace level to <n> ----------------------------------------------------
load: class client.class not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass0(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class[/code]
Help is greatly appreciated.

item.title: Webclient error=client.class
item.dc:creator: @randombama randombama
item.description:
@randombama wrote:

FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz:

Means you did not make the directory in the jar maker right for the client. Make sure when you make the directory to your client all the files are in one folder and not scattered in many other ones like “src” and “bin”.

My signlink is in a seperate folder would that be the problem?

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient error=client.class
item.dc:creator: @FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz
item.description:
@FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz wrote:

Means you did not make the directory in the jar maker right for the client. Make sure when you make the directory to your client all the files are in one folder and not scattered in many other ones like “src” and “bin”.

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient error=client.class
item.dc:creator: @randombama randombama
item.description:
@randombama wrote:

Edit: I can T.V.

Hello,
I have a little problem with my webclient I managed to do everything except load my client on my forums.
Client link -->Site Down Issue with Host :eek:
Heres is the error message I get when I “Click for Details”

[code]Java Plug-in 1.6.0_26
Using JRE version 1.6.0_26-b03 Java HotSpot™ Client VM
User home directory = C:\Users"mycompuser"

c: clear console window
f: finalize objects on finalization queue

Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class[/code]
